title: Generative AI Framework for 3D Object Generation in Augmented Reality
author: Majid Behravan (Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University), Denis Gracanin (Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University), Christopher L North (Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University), Xuan Wang (Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University), ...
relevance_why: The paper presents a generative AI framework that could inspire similar methodologies for audio processing tasks by integrating various multimodal inputs for creating meaningful outputs.
background: This research explores creating 3D objects in augmented reality using diverse inputs like images and speech, aiming to enhance user interaction and immersion.
contribution: This thesis introduces a framework that effectively integrates generative AI models to automate creating real-time 3D models from user inputs, contributing significantly to immersiveness in augmented reality applications.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Traditional 3D object generation methods often rely solely on manual modeling or limited automated processes.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work combines advanced object detection and generative AI, enabling real-time generation from multiple input modalities like speech and images.

key_innovation: Utilizes a combination of Vision Language Models and Large Language Models to enhance the accuracy and versatility of 3D object generation in augmented reality.
real_world_impact: This framework opens new avenues for applications in gaming, retail, and design by allowing non-experts to create personalized 3D models, thereby fostering creativity and innovation.
limitations: The paper mentions challenges like multilingual input handling and complex environment processing, potentially affecting the framework's robustness.

new_terms.Vision Language Models (VLMs): **Vision Language Models (VLMs)** are AI systems capable of interpreting visual inputs alongside textual data to enhance interaction capabilities.
new_terms.Large Language Models (LLMs): **Large Language Models (LLMs)** are sophisticated AI models that process and generate natural language, which can also help in understanding user intents from text inputs.
